DOC.brief_summary: Vascular responses to angiotensin II and histamine are compared before and after 30 days of systemic treatment with either irbesartan 150 mg or atorvastatin 20 mg.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Vascular Effects After Therapy With Irbesartan and Atorvastatin.
DOC.detailed_description: Vascular responses to angiotensin II and histamine are compared before and after 30 days of systemic treatment with either irbesartan 150 mg or atorvastatin 20 mg.
DOC.criteria: healthy subjects no relevant disease amendment: hypercholesterolaemic subjects any relevant disease
